description:
WARNING: As of early Feb 2016 Udemy only accepts recorded video and plain text as a valid course material.

If you are a fresh Udemy instructor chances are that you are having problems with producing your udemy lectures, am I right?

You are spending way too much time trying to figure out how to put all the pieces together using Camtasia, instead of focusing on delivering great content.

Don’t worry. It’s not your fault.

It’ can actually be quite a complicated process, if you don’t know the right ways and techniques to produce your udemy lectures in Camtasia.

And believe me, I know what it feels like.

I am a regular Udemy instructor, just like you,

I was feeling the same frustration and confusion, when I was producing my first course.

That’s why I promised myself to crack the Camtasia for Udemy code, so I can share it now with you, my fellow instructor.

Inside you will find all the necessary information to do most popular Udemy course formats:

  • Screen recording: to make your students feel like you made this video only for them, like you are guiding them personally
  • Talking head videos: to make you and your course more credible (so it converts way better)
  • Presentation recording: and how to add your face to it to add “the most popular Youtube channel in the world” feeling to your course
  • Killer intros: Did you know that students are even 10x more likely to enroll in a course with a great promo video?

I want to make you feel confident that your effort, that you put into developing your course won’t be diminished, because you are struggling with audio and video editing.

I am here to help you wrap your present in a beautiful wrapping paper.

I put all my heart in every course, that I create.

And I am proud of what my students say about my teaching:

I learnt more in one hour watching this course, than i would have if i had spent days reading online tutorials.

This course is jam-packed with information and Dawid's teaching styles keeps it interesting the whole way through. Thanks so much Dawid! You made the course fun and I learnt heaps.

But if for some reason you are not happy with the course, you are totally covered by a 30-day money back guarantee.

No questions asked. No frown faces.

So it’s up to you now.

Enroll in the course and start making your course beautiful for your students.

Dawid

PS. I am especially proud of what Nicky Burke had to say about my teachning style

Dawid, I really enjoyed this class. It was thorough, engaging and simply fantastic. You class helped me understand why I wasn't making much progress with a few other (...) courses I've taken in Udemy.
title: Camtasia and Udemy : Camtasia for Udemy Instructors
